title: PICO PARK:Classic Edition
notes: Steam shows Overwhelmingly Positive (97% of 16,275). SteamDB shows 95.79% positive; strong consensus.
raw_comment: A cooperative local multiplayer action puzzle game for 2-10 players. Up to 10 gamepads or phones as controllers. (See Pico Park a newer version for 8 local players + online mp without phone support.)
